message_1: What is the plaintext message that was encrypted using the rail fence cipher with 3 rails if the encrypted message is "TCSNRRBIIAOEPYMCGO"?
message_2:
To decrypt a message encrypted with the rail fence cipher with 3 rails, we need to arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern and then read the message horizontally. The encrypted message is "TCSNRRBIIAOEPYMCGO" and has 17 characters. We can arrange the letters as follows:

T . . . S . . . R . . . I . . . M . . . G
. C . N . R . B . I . A . O . E . P . Y . C
. . O . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . O

Now, we can read the plaintext message horizontally:

TSCIENCEPROGRAMYRCO

So, the decrypted message is "TSCIENCEPROGRAMYRCO".
